statements: SELECT * FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, drug_combination FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE drug_combination = 'Drug A & Drug B' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_history FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE patient_id <> 3 AND drug_combination LIKE '%Drug C%';
SELECT * FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE drug_combination IN ('Drug X & Drug Y', 'Drug Y & Drug Z') ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_combination, treatment_history FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE treatment_history IS NOT NULL AND patient_id < 5 ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT drug_combination, patient_id FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE patient_id > 10 ORDER BY drug_combination ASC
SELECT DISTINCT drug_combination FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE LENGTH(drug_combination) > 5
SELECT patient_id, drug_combination, treatment_history FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis WHERE drug_combination LIKE '%chemo%' AND treatment_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT SUM(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM DrugCombinationAnalysis
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_name, start_date, end_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, drug_name, dosage FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, start_date, end_date FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT drug_name, usage_instructions, side_effects FROM Drugs WHERE LENGTH(usage_instructions) > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT treatment_id, patient_name, drug_name, treatment_date FROM TreatmentHistory INNER JOIN Patients ON TreatmentHistory.patient_id = Patients.patient_id INNER JOIN Drugs ON TreatmentHistory.drug_id = Drugs.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age <= 25;

SELECT treatment_id, patient_name, drug_name, treatment_date FROM TreatmentHistory JOIN Patients ON TreatmentHistory.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Drugs ON TreatmentHistory.drug_id = Drugs.drug_id WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, usage_instructions, side_effects FROM Drugs WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(usage_instructions) > 50;
SELECT patient_name, condition, age FROM Patients WHERE condition LIKE '%flu%' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, duration, effectiveness_score FROM treatments WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_treatments WHERE DATE(date_started) = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, duration, effectiveness_score FROM treatments ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, date_started FROM patients JOIN patient_treatments ON patients.patient_id = patient_treatments.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, drugs FROM patients JOIN drug_combinations ON patients.patient_id = drug_combinations.patient_id WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Drugs WHERE drug_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT treatment_date, drug_id FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, side_effect_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN TreatmentHistory ON Treatments.treatment_id = TreatmentHistory.treatment_id JOIN SideEffects ON TreatmentHistory.side_effect_id = SideEffects.side_effect_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT t.treatment_date, p.patient_name, d.drug_name FROM Treatments t JOIN Patients p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Drugs d ON t.drug_id = d.drug_id;
SELECT th.history_id, se.side_effect_name FROM TreatmentHistory th JOIN SideEffects se ON th.side_effect_id = se.side_effect_id WHERE th.duration > 7;

SELECT p.patient_name, se.side_effect_name FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN TreatmentHistory th ON t.treatment_id = th.treatment_id JOIN SideEffects se ON th.side_effect_id = se.side_effect_id;
